description: Horny, athletic Wesley Woods receives a final letter from his hubby giving him full permission to move on, and fuck whomever he desires. He’s getting hot and heavy with dark-haired, fit Colton when all of a sudden his muscular, tall husband Pierce Paris appears out of nowhere! Wesley is shocked to learn that his hubby faked the whole thing so he could get him into accepting the idea of being in an open relationship. Handsome Pierce missed Wesley’s juicy bottom, and couldn’t wait to dive in again with his thick meat, leaving Colton with no choice but to masturbate, and watch all the action!
title: Last Will And Fuck Part 3
